Interface GameObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameGUI

    public interface GameObserver
    Methods used by the game view.

    quentin sauvage

      • update

        void update(java.lang.String str)
        Updates the window depending on the action.
        Parameters:

      • update

        void update(int posX,
            int posY,
            int index)
        Updates the corresponding cell with the index sprite in the sprites list to remove.
        Parameters:
        posX - the column number.
        posY - the row number.
        index - the index of the sprite in the list.

      • update

        void update(int lastX,
            int lastY,
            int newX,
            int newY,
            int index,
            int life,
            boolean add)
        Updates the corresponding cell with the index sprite in the sprites list to remove.
        Parameters:
        lastX - the last column number.
        lastY - the last row number.
        newX - the new column number.
        newY - the new row number.
        index - the index of the sprite in the list.
        life - of the player to draw.
        add - to know if the player sprite should be redrawn.

      • update

        void update(int posX,
            int posY,
            int index,
            boolean add)
        Updates the corresponding cell with the index sprite in the sprites list to remove.
        Parameters:
        posX - the column number.
        posY - the row number.
        add - boolean to know if we're adding or removing.

      • update

        void update(char[][] map,
            java.util.List<Bomb> bombsList,
            java.util.List<Bonus> bonusList)
        Update the map background and bombs added by explosion.
        Parameters:
        map - The new map state.
        bombsList - the list of bombs to add.
        bonusList - the list of bonus to add.

      • update

        void update(Bomb removedBomb,
            Bonus removedBonus)
        Update the map when player collect an object.
        Parameters:
        removedBomb - the possible bomb to remove..
        removedBonus - The possible bonus to remove.
